doc-checker.class.description: Check that all classes have a docstring. Set to 'true' to enable this check.

doc-checker.function.description: Check that all functions have a docstring. Set to 'true' to enable this check.

doc-checker.method.description: Check that all methods have a docstring. Set to 'true' to enable this check.

doc-checker.module.description: Check that all modules have a docstring. Set to 'true' to enable this check.

doc-checker.parameter.description: Check that all functions and methods have updated parameters. Set to 'true' to activate.

doc-checker.throw.description: Check that all functions and methods have updated throws. Set to 'true' to activate.

doc-checker.return.description: Check that all functions and methods have updated returns. Set to 'true' to activate.

doc-checker.activateOnChange.description: Enable the checker to run automatically when switching between files.

doc-checker.mode.description: Choose when to activate the checker. 'modify' activates on any file modification, 'save' activates on file save.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
